title: Installing Mac OS X on an Apple TV - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Installing Mac OS X on an Apple TV - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
Install Mac OS X on Apple TV
Can you install Mac OS X on Apple TV
description: Can you install Mac OS X on an Apple TV (first-gen)? Mac OS X runs on Intel, and the Apple TV uses an Intel Pentium M, so it's gotta be possible, right? Today, Krazy Ken and Brainiac Brent are gonna do it, and you're gonna join the suffering!  Special thanks to Linode for sponsoring this video! Fulfill your cloud computing needs, and sign up now (plus save $20 with my link)    Join our channel and get cool stuff!   Watch the SSD upgrade episode here   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like us on Facebook   Follow us on Twitter    Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures - Installing Mac OS X on an Apple TV  Thanks Brainiac Brent for helping! Brent Penrose (@PenroseFilms)  Thanks Greg Hrutkay for the iFixit toolkit! Hrutkay Mods    Pledge on Patreon now to get your name in the show credits and gain access to Krazy Ken's VIP Discord channel!*   Contact Us    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Shop all of Amazon    Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program. *not all Patreon tiers qualify for all rewards #KrazyKen #ComputerClan
